reviewText: I was totally captivated and profoundly moved by this movie. That's why I had to own it. The young actress is wonderful and a doll. It's a rich human drama that completely drew me in and the ending is very satisfying. Watch it, I don't think you'll be disappointed. (One caveat: I have a DVD player that plays region 2 discs; I don't know if this flick is available for region 1 players.)
